00015 template <class Type, bool DelArray = false>
00016 class TOptDelPtr: public TPointerBase<Type>
00017 {
00018 public:
00019        typedef TPointerBase<Type> BaseClass;
00020 
00026        TOptDelPtr(Type* ptr = NULL, bool releaseFlag = false);
00027 
00033        TOptDelPtr(const TOptDelPtr& ptr);
00034 
00039        ~TOptDelPtr();

00075        TOptDelPtr& operator=(const TOptDelPtr& ptr);
00081        TOptDelPtr& operator=(Type* ptr);
00082 
00088        template <class SourceType>
00089        bool SetCastedOrRemove(SourceType* ptr, bool releaseFlag = false)
00090        {
00091               Type* castedPtr = dynamic_cast<Type*>(ptr);
00092 
00093               SetPtr(castedPtr, releaseFlag);
00094 
00095               if (castedPtr != NULL){
00096                      return true;
00097               }
00098               else if (releaseFlag){
00099                      delete ptr;
00100               }
00101 
00102               return false;
00103        }
00104 
00105 protected:
00110        void Detach();
00111 
00112 private:
00113        bool m_releaseFlag;
00114 };

00155 template <class Type, bool DelArray>

00157 {
00158        Detach();

00161

00166 template <class Type, bool DelArray>
00167 inline Type* TOptDelPtr<Type, DelArray>::PopPtr()
00168 {
00169        Type* slavePtr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00170        BaseClass::SetPtr(NULL);
00171 
00172        return slavePtr;
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 template <class Type, bool DelArray>
00177 void TOptDelPtr<Type, DelArray>::TakeOver(TOptDelPtr& sourcePtr)
00178 {
00179        SetPtr(sourcePtr.PopPtr());
00180 }

00207 // protected methods
00208 
00209 template <class Type, bool DelArray>
00210 void TOptDelPtr<Type, DelArray>::Detach()
00211 {
00212        if (m_releaseFlag){
00213               Type* ptr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00214               if (ptr == NULL){
00215                      return;
00216               }
00217 
00218               if (DelArray){
00219                      delete[] ptr;
00220               }
00221               else{
00222                      delete ptr;
00223               }
00224        }
00225 }
